short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever wanted to prank someone by playing a fart sound on their browser? Well! Prank someone with this fart sound-maker!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension plays a fart sound on any computer that has it installed. Prank your friends with it! 

You can to make it stop, just go to where all your extensions are (example: chrome://extensions/) and deactivate it or uninstall.
